'''The Cat and the Cocktail''' is the first act in [[Diona]]'s [[Hangout Event]]. In order to unlock this quest line, the player needs 2 [[Story Key]]s, have completed [[Prologue]] Act III: [[Song of the Dragon and Freedom]], and reached [[Adventure Rank]] 26.

==Description==
They say that there's a popular bartender at The Cat's Tail.

==Trivia==
